trans-unit.source: How to install MySQL on Azure
trans-unit.target: How to install MySQL on Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to install the MySQL stack on a Linux virtual machine (VM) in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to install the MySQL stack on a Linux virtual machine (VM) in Azure.

trans-unit.source: You can install on Ubuntu or RedHat family OS.
trans-unit.target: You can install on Ubuntu or RedHat family OS.

trans-unit.source: How to install MySQL on Azure
trans-unit.target: How to install MySQL on Azure

trans-unit.source: In this article, you will learn how to install and configure MySQL on an Azure virtual machine running Linux.
trans-unit.target: In this article, you will learn how to install and configure MySQL on an Azure virtual machine running Linux.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You must already have a Microsoft Azure virtual machine running Linux in order to complete this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You must already have a Microsoft Azure virtual machine running Linux in order to complete this tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Please see the
trans-unit.target: Please see the

trans-unit.source: [Azure Linux VM tutorial](virtual-machines-linux-tutorial.md) to create and set up a Linux VM with `mysqlnode` as the VM name and `azureuser` as user before proceeding.
trans-unit.target: [Azure Linux VM tutorial](virtual-machines-linux-tutorial.md) to create and set up a Linux VM with `mysqlnode` as the VM name and `azureuser` as user before proceeding.

trans-unit.source: [In this case, use 3306 port as the MySQL port.]
trans-unit.target: [In this case, use 3306 port as the MySQL port.]

trans-unit.source: Install MySQL on your virtual machine
trans-unit.target: Install MySQL on your virtual machine

trans-unit.source: Connect to the Linux VM you created via putty.
trans-unit.target: Connect to the Linux VM you created via putty.

trans-unit.source: If this is the first time you use Azure Linux VM, see how to use putty connect to a Linux VM [here](virtual-machines-linux-use-ssh-key.md).
trans-unit.target: If this is the first time you use Azure Linux VM, see how to use putty connect to a Linux VM [here](virtual-machines-linux-use-ssh-key.md).

trans-unit.source: We will use repository package to install MySQL5.6 as an example in this article.
trans-unit.target: We will use repository package to install MySQL5.6 as an example in this article.

trans-unit.source: Actually, MySQL5.6 has more improvement in performance than MySQL5.5.
trans-unit.target: Actually, MySQL5.6 has more improvement in performance than MySQL5.5.

trans-unit.source: More information [here](http://www.mysqlperformanceblog.com/2013/02/18/is-mysql-5-6-slower-than-mysql-5-5/).
trans-unit.target: More information [here](http://www.mysqlperformanceblog.com/2013/02/18/is-mysql-5-6-slower-than-mysql-5-5/).

trans-unit.source: How to install MySQL5.6 on Ubuntu
trans-unit.target: How to install MySQL5.6 on Ubuntu

trans-unit.source: We will use Linux VM with Ubuntu from Azure here.
trans-unit.target: We will use Linux VM with Ubuntu from Azure here.

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Install MySQL Server 5.6
trans-unit.target: Step 1: Install MySQL Server 5.6

trans-unit.source: Switch to `root` user:
trans-unit.target: Switch to `root` user:

trans-unit.source: Install mysql-server 5.6:
trans-unit.target: Install mysql-server 5.6:

trans-unit.source: During installation, you will see a dialog window poping up to ask you to set MySQL root password below, and you need set the password here.
trans-unit.target: During installation, you will see a dialog window poping up to ask you to set MySQL root password below, and you need set the password here.

trans-unit.source: image
trans-unit.target: image

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Login MySQL Server
trans-unit.target: Step 2: Login MySQL Server

trans-unit.source: When MySQL server installation finished, MySQL service will be started automatically.
trans-unit.target: When MySQL server installation finished, MySQL service will be started automatically.

trans-unit.source: You can login MySQL Server with `root` user.
trans-unit.target: You can login MySQL Server with `root` user.

trans-unit.source: Use the below command to login and input password.
trans-unit.target: Use the below command to login and input password.

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Manage the running MySQL service
trans-unit.target: Step 3: Manage the running MySQL service

trans-unit.source: (a) Get status of MySQL service
trans-unit.target: (a) Get status of MySQL service

trans-unit.target: (b) Start MySQL Service

trans-unit.source: (c) Stop MySQL service
trans-unit.target: (c) Stop MySQL service

trans-unit.target: (d) Restart the MySQL service
